snippet: A cloud of uncertainty has drifted in over the hallowed national laboratory that has been a crucible of the United States’ nuclear weapons research and development.
abstract: Residents of Los Alamos, NM, brace for layoffs at the Los Alamos National Laboratory amid a budget shortfall; lab is laying off up to 11 percent of its 7,600 permanent employees, a target that officials hope can be reached through volunteers; fiscal 2012 budget is $300 million less than $2.55 billion 2011 budget.
lead_paragraph: A cloud of uncertainty has drifted in over the hallowed national laboratory that has been a crucible of the United States’ nuclear weapons research and development.

headline.seo: Los Alamos Braces for Deep Cuts at Lab
headline.main: Los Alamos Residents Brace for Layoffs at Lab
headline.print_headline: Los Alamos Residents Brace for Layoffs at Lab
